title: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines that contain a mix of tabs and spaces, nothing happens.
EB: The software should properly handle lines with mixed tabs and spaces when executing the ShiftLeft command.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following: <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2.
3. Highlight the two lines mentioned above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft command and observe that nothing happens.
